column4: i have a dvd+rw dvd.. but failing to blank it after burning some data in it
Error: this media does not support blanking, ignoring.
This drive or media does not support the 'BLANK media' command
so I must be misunderstanding dvd+rw rewritable label?
is your system capable of handling rewritable disks?
not every CD/DVD burner can work with RW disks
